name: facet-html-diff-wasm
description: Browser tests for facet-html-diff WASM patch application

scripts.build:wasm: cargo build -p facet-html-diff-wasm --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && wasm-bindgen --target web --out-dir pkg ../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/facet_html_diff_wasm.wasm
